Class Main_Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • Main_Window
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class Main_Window
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Main_Window controls the UI and is an observer of Game and QuestionClient
    Version:
    2019-03-08
    Author:
    Niclas Tauson
